title: Iranian intelligence agents plotted brazen abduction of Brooklyn dissident journalist, U.S. prosecutors say
content:
1. Iranian intelligence agents plotted brazen abduction of Brooklyn dissident journalist, U.S. prosecutors say  The Washington Post
  2. Four Iranians charged with plotting to kidnap author living in Brooklyn  NBC News
  3. Iranian Operatives Charged in Plot to Kidnap a Brooklyn Author  The New York Times
  4. NYC journalist targeted by Iranian operatives in twisted kidnapping plot, feds say  New York Post
  5. Iranian intelligence operatives charged in plot to kidnap author living in Brooklyn  The Week Magazine

localize.title: イランの諜報員がブルックリンの反体制派ジャーナリストの拉致を計画していたと米検察当局が発表
美国检察官说，伊朗情报人员策划了对布鲁克林持不同政见记者的无耻绑架。
美國檢察官說，伊朗情報人員策劃了對布魯克林持不同政見記者的無恥綁架。
